author: Joshua Fluke
description:
Are you even working… or are you just REALLY good at not getting caught?

Business Insider says if you use ChatGPT or Claude at work and don’t tell your boss, you’re an “AI Creeper.”
Meanwhile your boss says “Can you have this done by Friday?” and you say yes — because AI finished it in 10 minutes.

And no, you’re not telling them.
Because telling them means:
• more work
• fewer coworkers
• or “interesting conversations about your role going forward”

Workers aren’t hiding AI because they’re shady.
They’re hiding it because corporations haven’t decided whether AI is a tool, a threat, or an excuse to delete your job and post about “resilience” on LinkedIn.

Surveys show most employees already use AI — they just don’t say it out loud.
No policy. No protection. All risk.
So yeah… people are closing tabs, minimizing windows, and suddenly becoming “Excel wizards.”

If your productivity doubled overnight and nobody knows why…
If your AI tab vanishes when footsteps approach…
If you pretend i
title: THE RISE OF AI CREEPERS!
